text:
@JohnCornyn @WSJ No one said “testing is everything”. Epidemiologists and public health experts use testing as a tool to protect the public. Since our elected officials have a responsibility to protect the public, we expect @JohnCornyn to listen to those experts. 
https://t.co/QFlKBVKWUj
